item.description:
Hi all! This is the start up meetup for the Brunch Bunch group! I am starting this group because several people in my Friday night dinner group expressed an interest in brunch. In order to avoid confusion, I decided to start this group up and have a single focus for each group.

I chose Cafe Paragon as our first location as it is fairly centrally located in Providence and they have a really nice buffet that seemed reasonably priced. The brunch runs from 10-2 on Sundays and is $13.99 without alcohol or $17.99 with a bloody mary or mimosa. See their website http://www.paragonand... for the brunch menu and pictures of their location.

I am making a reservation for 12 people, so that will be the maximum number of people to RSVP. In addition, I am eliminating maybe responses in order to allow those who really want to attend to get a spot.

In order to help defray the cost of hosting a group on meetup, I would like to ask all members who attend meetups to contribute a dollar at alternating events. There will be no real tracking of this, but it would just be a good will donation to help me out. Thanks all!

I think this is going to be fun and I look forward to meeting everyone. Yay brunch!
item.how_to_find_us: I am, plus sized, 5'2', with shoulder length red hair and glasses with dark rims.
item.why: You will get good food and great conversation with people who have similar interests(well at least in brunch anyway)...
item.name: Rhode Island Brunch Bunch! February Meetup- CAFE PARAGON
